headline: L3Harris: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: On a per-share basis, the Melbourne, Florida-based company said it had net income of $2.44. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs and costs related to mergers and acquisitions, came to $2.78 per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: L3Harris: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: On a per-share basis, the Melbourne, Florida-based company said it had net income of $2.44. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs and costs related to mergers and acquisitions, came to $2.78 per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.
